items.content_html: Lightweight JavaScript overlay progress bar as a singleton utility
items.title: Vlad345345/bs-progressbar: Lightweight JavaScript overlay progress bar as a singleton utility

items.content_html: A lightweight utility for Node.js projects that accumulates items into fixed-size batches per key, preserving insertion order within each key. Streams items directly into their respective batches at runtime, eliminating the overhead of post-processing 1D arrays into chunks. It abstracts key-based batch management.
items.title: SamarthKulkarni20/keyed-batched-items-accumulator: A lightweight utility for Node.js projects that accumulates items into fixed-size batches per key, preserving insertion order within each key. Streams items directly into their respective batches at runtime, eliminating the overhead of post-processing 1D arrays into chunks. It abstracts key-based batch management.

items.content_html: üßà ButterPop.js - A lightweight (<100KB), zero-dependency toast notification library with 23 beautiful themes. items.content_html: User-crud-server is a lightweight API designed for managing user data with simple create, read, update, and delete operations. It offers a straightforward interface for developers to integrate user management into their applications efficiently.
items.title: Nikhilkumarseeda/user-crud-server: User-crud-server is a lightweight API designed for managing user data with simple create, read, update, and delete operations. It offers a straightforward interface for developers to integrate user management into their applications efficiently.

items.content_html: psfree-lapse is a lightweight tool that simplifies the process of creating time-lapse videos from still images. It supports various image formats and allows users to customize frame rates for smooth playback.
items.title: 1landres/psfree-lapse: psfree-lapse is a lightweight tool that simplifies the process of creating time-lapse videos from still images. It supports various image formats and allows users to customize frame rates for smooth playback.

items.content_html: Smart Table Loader is a lightweight, browser-based tool that lets you upload and display CSV (comma separated values), Excel (.xls/.xlsx), or JSON files in a dynamic and interactive HTML table powered by DataTables.js. This tool is great for quick data analysis without the need for installing heavy software.
items.title: BaseMax/smart-table-loader: Smart Table Loader is a lightweight, browser-based tool that lets you upload and display CSV (comma separated values), Excel (.xls/.xlsx), or JSON files in a dynamic and interactive HTML table powered by DataTables.js. This tool is great for quick data analysis without the need for installing heavy software.

items.content_html: Imagist is a lightweight, client-side image editing tool built with HTML, CSS (Tailwind CSS and custom styles), and vanilla JavaScript. It offers a clean, modern, and intuitive interface, inspired by Apple's design aesthetic, allowing users to perform common image manipulation tasks directly in their browser.
items.title: vladanila/imagist: Imagist is a lightweight, client-side image editing tool built with HTML, CSS (Tailwind CSS and custom styles), and vanilla JavaScript. It offers a clean, modern, and intuitive interface, inspired by Apple's design aesthetic, allowing users to perform common image manipulation tasks directly in their browser.

items.content_html: An advanced AI-powered fake news detection system that verifies text, images, and social media posts using Gemini AI, FastAPI, and Next.js. Includes a modern web interface, a lightweight Streamlit app, and a Chrome extension for real-time fake content detection. Built to combat misinformation with explainable AI results and contextual source links.
items.title: colddsam/Truth-Guardian: An advanced AI-powered fake news detection system that verifies text, images, and social media posts using Gemini AI, FastAPI, and Next.js. Includes a modern web interface, a lightweight Streamlit app, and a Chrome extension for real-time fake content detection. Built to combat misinformation with explainable AI results and contextual source links.
